item.title: getopt vs. optparse vs. argparse
item.description: sooner or later you’ll end up needing to do some argument parsing. the foolish end up writing their own yucky parser that ends up having a big if statement filled with things like: if len(sys.argv) > 1 in it. don’t do this unless you have a really good excuse. sooner or later, someone directs you to getopt, and you happily continue on with buggy manual parsing thinking you’ve “found the way”.
